Class BaseZdoQuery

Base class for making ZDO based queries within an area of the world.

Inheritance
System.Object
BaseZdoQuery
ZdoPrefabQuery
Namespace: SpawnThat.World.Queries
Assembly: Valheim.SpawnThat.dll
Syntax
public abstract class BaseZdoQuery

Constructors

| Improve this Doc View Source

BaseZdoQuery(Vector3, Int32)

Prepares for querying zdo's within the zones indicated by the center and range. Selects all ZDO's and ZoneId's using the square formed by the input, and caches them for subsequent queries.

Declaration
protected BaseZdoQuery(Vector3 center, int range)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector3 center
System.Int32 range
